pages.text: Right clicking a Card in your hand will open up it's UI. You can also right click a card inside a $(l:mtlasers:laser_node)Node$(/l) UI.$(br2)Insert Mode:$(br)1. $(l:mtlasers:modes)Mode$(/l)$(br)2. $(l:mtlasers:sneaky)Sneaky$(/l)$(br)3.
